description: female allegory or angel, resting on clouds, holding a torch in PR hand; wearing flowing draperies; bare-chested
marks: Signature LRC, in black chalk: [Lzo (?)-De Ferrari]
provenance: [Herbert Feist, New York, until 1973; sold June 13, for $275, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1973-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Female Allegory
